analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x662352895d4cf40cb0643b59831ac68b9250f4db.sol:
	Contract BitShopperToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x662352895d4cf40cb0643b59831ac68b9250f4db.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x662352895d4cf40cb0643b59831ac68b9250f4db.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x662352895d4cf40cb0643b59831ac68b9250f4db.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x662352895d4cf40cb0643b59831ac68b9250f4db.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
